Description: The rest on the flight into Egypt; the Virgin sitting in a landscape with the Christchild on her lap; surrounded by playing putti; early impression, blank on verso. Woodcut
Curator's comments: The woodcut first used in an unidentified publication by Egenolph in Frankfurt in the 1550s.
Bibliographic references: Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (II.162.2)
